name: NSAlignmentFeedbackFilter
desc: An object that can filter the movement of an object and provides haptic feedback when alignment occurs.

items.name: class var inputEventMask: NSEvent.EventTypeMask
items.desc: Retrieves the event types the filter accepts.

items.name: func update(with: NSEvent)
items.desc: Informs the feedback filter about a new event.

items.name: func update(withPanRecognizer: NSPanGestureRecognizer)
items.desc: Informs the feedback filter about a new pan (drag) gesture recognizer event.

items.name: func alignmentFeedbackTokenForMovement(in: NSView?, previousPoint: NSPoint, alignedPoint: NSPoint, defaultPoint: NSPoint) -> NSAlignmentFeedbackToken?
items.desc: Requests a feedback token for the alignment of an object requiring horizontal and vertical movement.

items.name: func alignmentFeedbackTokenForHorizontalMovement(in: NSView?, previousX: CGFloat, alignedX: CGFloat, defaultX: CGFloat) -> NSAlignmentFeedbackToken?
items.desc: Requests a feedback token for the alignment of an object requiring horizontal movement only.

items.name: func alignmentFeedbackTokenForVerticalMovement(in: NSView?, previousY: CGFloat, alignedY: CGFloat, defaultY: CGFloat) -> NSAlignmentFeedbackToken?
items.desc: Requests a feedback token for the alignment of an object requiring vertical movement only.

items.name: func performFeedback([NSAlignmentFeedbackToken], performanceTime: NSHapticFeedbackManager.PerformanceTime)
items.desc: Performs the haptic feedback described by one or more alignment feedback tokens.
